From check in to the bar to the view of Times Square this is simply the place to stay when booking a show or planning to shop and dine.
« Not as good as Best Western »
No help from desk impersonal and disinterested No tea or coffee in room Not even a bottle opener No response when something broken Everything too hard for the hotel
« A pleasant business trip to New York »
The ideal hotel for my business trip. Close nearby the office, friendly staff, clean and comfortable room and a nice gym.
« Always enjoy staying at Novotel Times Square, wouldn't stay anywhere else! »
Unfortunately too short! Whenever we come to NYC we think of Novotel. Staff always very courteous, rooms kept clean.
